identification.translation[0].definition: official papers or cards, such as your passport, that prove who you are
fingerprinting as a means of identification
Bring some form of identification, preferably a passport.
when someone says officially that they know who someone else is, especially a criminal or a dead person
His body was taken to Brighton mortuary for identification.
when you recognize something or discover exactly what it is
the identification of children who need professional help
the act of saying that two things are very closely related
the identification of sexism with womenâ€™s oppression
a strong feeling of sympathy with someone that makes you able to share their feelings
my identification with the heroine of the book
